Articles.Content:
Hey all

so i launched the stock space station core into orbit. i moved one of the two crew members down from the crew module to the storage module underneath it (if your not familiar with the craft, from the Mk-2 landing can to the storage crew thing directly underneath it, the one with the solar panels). thing is, as soon as he boards he disappears. just, gone. i cant find him, he doesn't even have his little animation in the lower right corner anymore. i know where he should be, but i dont now how to check, or even better, how to interact with him and possibly get him out.

I can right click to get the info windows, but i cant left click on the crew hatch. I'm on a mac if that helps.

THANKS!!

You should be able to left click on the crew hatch, which will open a list of Kerbals in there.

Try going back to space center then back to the station and try again

Eatorsp is right - the storage cans don't show the Kerbals in the bottom right of the screen, but they can still be accessed by clicking on the door of the module (mouse label will come up 'Crew Hatch').

Some very large conglomerate structures also seem to sometimes not show some of the Kerbals, even in proper command pods. Again they can be acces
I believe you also posted this question on Reddit? As I noted there, the Hitchhiker module has a known bug in which some kerbals go into it and simply vanish, never to be seen again.
it allways happends if the kerbal you are trying to bord with, has the same name as one of the kerbals allready inside!
